item.title: About Me
item.description: I am avid gamer. I play a lot of stuff, mostly singleplayer games, but I play Dota 2 the most, other coop games like Payday 2, and racing games.
item.content: I am avid gamer. I play a lot of stuff, mostly singleplayer games, but I play Dota 2 the most, other coop games like Payday 2, and racing games.

item.title: CV
item.description: Experience Special Program for the Employment of Students (SPES) Summer 2017 Human Resources Office Municipal Hall Bulalacao Special Program for the Employment of Students (SPES) Summer 2018 Budget Office Municipal Hall Bulalacao Education Education University of the Philippines Los Baños Aug 2019 - Present Bachelor of Science in Applied Physics Los Baños, Philippines Skills Programming Languages: Proficient in Python and Fortran Proficient in LaTeX Experience in HTML 3D Printing Experience in 3D Printing Linux: Literate in Linux based Operating Systems Advanced skills in Linux Graphics: Experience in Adobe Photoshop and Premiere as well as Gimp Problem Solving: Strong problem-solving skills with a logical and analytical approach Experience in troubleshooting and debugging complex technical issues Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders effectively Teamwork: Proven ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams to achieve project goals.
item.content:
Experience

Special Program for the Employment of Students (SPES) Summer 2017
Human Resources Office Municipal Hall Bulalacao
Special Program for the Employment of Students (SPES) Summer 2018
Budget Office Municipal Hall Bulalacao

Education

Education

University of the Philippines Los Baños Aug 2019 - Present
Bachelor of Science in Applied Physics Los Baños, Philippines

Skills

Programming Languages:

  • Proficient in Python and Fortran
  • Proficient in LaTeX
  • Experience in HTML

3D Printing

  • Experience in 3D Printing

Linux:

  • Literate in Linux based Operating Systems
  • Advanced skills in Linux

Graphics:

  • Experience in Adobe Photoshop and Premiere as well as Gimp

Problem Solving:

  • Strong problem-solving skills with a logical and analytical approach
  • Experience in troubleshooting and debugging complex technical issues

Communication:

  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills
  • Ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders effectively

Teamwork:

  • Proven ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams to achieve project goals.

Continuous Learning:

  • Passionate about learning new technologies and staying updated with industry trends.
  • Dedication to self-improvement and skill enhancement through online courses, workshops, and projects.

Volunteer Experiences

UP Mindoreños’ Academic Review - Lecturer(2019,2024) Taal Volcano Eruption Volunteer(2020)

Research Experience

High School Research

Development of 3D printing filaments from Polyethylene Terephthalate(PET)

Hobbies

  • Video Games
  • Coding
  • Making content
  • Music
  • Tinkering with technology
